description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-45216)- Support "Lock project for viewing" Protection option in VbaProject Properties 
(CELLSNET-44219)- Password protect the VBA project 
(CELLSNET-45246)- Implement Sort Warning feature - Sort anything that looks like a number 
(CELLSNET-45278)- Function SetColumnHeaderToolTip(int colIndex, string toolTip) missing in newer APIs set 
(CELLSNET-45201)- change filter list to multiple checkbox selection list for GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-42557)- PivotTable Grouping and Pivot Report Filter selection disappears when load in GridWeb 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-45281)- Sparklines disappear after rendering to PDF 
(CELLSNET-45280)- Sparklines disappear after re-saving the file 
Performance
(CELLSNET-44438)- OutOfMemoryException while saving CSV to PDF 
(CELLSNET-45231)- Format tag in the SpreadsheetML content keeps hanging on loading 
(CELLSNET-45219)- Remove some calls to string.ToUpper() method (if possible) in the source code 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45242)- Some shapes are separated/distorted and dim in the rendered PDF file 
(CELLSNET-45275)- Removing worksheet causes to save a corrupt XLSM 
(CELLSNET-45262)- Saving worksheet as HTML with overflowed text in cells 
(CELLSNET-45248)- Some text is overlapping or invisible and vertical alignment is not right in Excel to HTML rendering 
(CELLSNET-45229)- When HTML is saved as XLSX, text layout is different. 
(CELLSNET-45228)- When HTML is saved as XLSX, text format is changed. 
(CELLSNET-45227)- When HTML is saved as XLSX, part of content is missing. 
(CELLSNET-45195)- When loading HTML and save it as XLSX, paragraphs are missing and changed. 
(CELLSNET-45254)- Issue with Pivot Filters Text
(CELLSNET-45267)-Number format does not work correctly in the pivot table
(CELLSNET-45170)- Some text is overlapping with other cells and vertical alignment is not right 
(CELLSNET-45263)- Problem while importing dates around 1900 from CSV file 
(CELLSNET-45283)- Font is bolder in the output PDF file when setting the PDF optimization type to "MinimumSize" 
(CELLSNET-45265)- Font changed in the output image/PDF
(CELLSNET-45235)- Slight Vertical Alignment Difference between Excel and Aspose.Cells Pdfs 
(CELLSNET-45272)- Font is different and percentage sign is missing in the output PDF file 
(CELLSNET-45233)- Charts have "Axis Title" 
(CELLSNET-45232)- 3D Column charts are not rendered fine in the output PDF file 
(CELLSNET-45188)- Category axis labels are not showing of chart in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-45292)- Deleting worksheet in XLSM leaves behind a remnant sheet in vba project 
(CELLSNET-45286)- When specific file is saved, the output is corrupted. 
(CELLSNET-45285)- Excel documents gets corrupted after Save 
(CELLSNET-45261)- Formula 'DAYS' in Excel tables gets replaced with a NamedRange 
(CELLSNET-45260)- Setting LightAngle value corrupts excel file 
(CELLSNET-45253)- Inserting rows breaking formulas linking to external workbook 
(CELLSNET-45252)- The table style was changed (The table lines are missing) after re-save in a specific XLS 
(CELLSNET-45249)- Aspose.Cells sorts fine but formulas are converted to values 
(CELLSNET-45244)- Cells range deletion with shift up option does not style on Cells 
(CELLSNET-45241)- Workbook gets corrupt after open and save 
(CELLSNET-45237)- Datatable is not being shifted down properly in an XLSX 
(CELLSNET-45236)- Cannot read worksheets of a password protected XLSX file 
(CELLSNET-45234)- Cells.DeleteRange() is not working properly 
(CELLSNET-45226)- Cannot update OleObject.ObjectSourceFullName property 
(CELLSNET-45225)- Cells range deletion with shift up option does not decrease hyperlink count 
(CELLSNET-45220)- Incorrect hyperlinks count when duplicating the single row data in an XLS 
(CELLSNET-45215)- Moving the array in Input2.xlsx results in an unopenable file that crashes excel on startup 
(CELLSNET-45214)- Reference in the array does not update when the referenced cells are moved in Input.xlsx 
(CELLSNET-45191)- Replace background for shape doesn't work 
(CELLSNET-45183)- The "Locked" attribute of ActiveX control (ComboBox) is not changed while protecting worksheet 
(CELLSNET-45276)- Horizontal scrollbar lost (in Google chrome) in GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-45273)- Big lags (in scrolling, selecting a cell, etc.) when using long list of merged cells 
(CELLSNET-45257)- The alignment of the cells lost when inserting/pasting values into the cells 
(CELLSNET-45251)- Percentage value changes to NaN 
(CELLSNET-44555)- Problem setting the value of a cell with percentage format 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44975)- Formatting error inside shapes texts when excel is converted to pdf 
(CELLSNET-45266)- VbaProject.Sign Exception 
(CELLSNET-45239)- Re-adding a picture to the same XLS throws a Null Reference error
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
